title: As an EBIS User, I want to see that players traded within 72 hours of Opening Day remain in â€œNot Yet  Reportedâ€�
custom_preconds:
* AC:
** For players that are traded within 72 hours of Opening Day, have them remain with the â€œNot Yet Reported â€œstatus on EBIS
** This will be enacted for players traded both within 72 hours prior to OD and 72 hours after OD

title: React Create new menus need to have permission checks
custom_preconds: The React create new menu should only show the items the user has available to them

title: As a BOC User, I want to be able to create a "BOC Only" row in the Player History widget
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Go a playerâ€™s Player History page
* Select the Add Entry dropdown button
* There will be a â€œBOC Onlyâ€� option
* Selecting this option will create a new row at the top of the table
** Only BOC users will have viewing access to the rows that are added with this button
* BOC Only rows will be highlighted in pale yellow

title: As a league econ user I want outrighted player's salary values to show up under LRD payroll as Minor League salary
custom_preconds:
Since 2017 we have shown outrighted player salary under the CBT payroll as minor league salary.

Users would now like to start showing that value on the LRD payroll as well.  They have asked that we retro fill this in starting with 2023 (and to continue showing it post 2023).

They have also asked that we provide them with the list of all 2023 contracts that will be updated as a result of this change.

title: Add download button to MN Insurance Batch
custom_preconds: Mn insurance batch needs a download button similar to what the Highmark batch has. There should be a button available for each batch run and should download a copy of the JSON file that was sent to BCC.

title: As an EBIS User, I want to see new Player Letters without the ability to reject Contemplated Option/Outright assignments
custom_preconds:
* For players with 5 or more years of MLS and valid Advanced Consent, there will be new Player Letters that do not have the â€œI will reject the assignmentâ€� option
* AC:
** Go to a Player Profile and select create new Player Letters
** In the next dropdown menu, there will be two new options:
*** Notice to Player with 5 or more years MLS and Advanced Consent of Optional Assignment
*** Notice to Player with 5 or more years MLS and Advanced Consent of Outright Assignment
** Upon selecting either of these player letter options, inputting required information, and selecting Print, a PDF file will appear
** This PDF will be exactly the same as the original Contemplated Option/Outright for 5+ players, but without the option to reject the assignment

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a hard error for Clubs that try to backdate 60-Day IL Placements
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Go to someoneâ€™s Player History page, create a new transaction, select Injured List, and select Place on 60-Day IL
* If a Club tries to backdate a 60-Day Injured List Placement for a player, there should be a hard error message that pops up.
* The Placement Date should match the Roster Affected Date at all times

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to view a Domestic MNC for a player transferred from the DSL
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Domestic â€œcontractsâ€� for players transferred from the DSL will be visible in both the playerâ€™s Contract History widget and on the Add C widget with a type of â€œDSL Transfer Câ€�
* Opening this item will load a form that matches the current version of a single C that includes
** Assigning Club from the transfer TX
** Domestic Salary Scales from CBA
** Add F
** Add G
** Comments 
** BOC Comments
** Attachment Section
* Editing, Saving, Printing permissions and flows will match existing single C logic
* When a DSL Transfer C is printed, the domestic â€œcontractâ€� is printed
** Story PIVOTAL-1840

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to print a Domestic MNC for a DSL player
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When viewing the â€œDomestic mUPCâ€� modal, there will be a â€˜Create & Printâ€™ button
* Clicking this button will print a new PDF of the domestic
* This new PDF will be an abbreviated version of the Domestic Contract and will contain the following:
** Domestic Boilerplate
** Add A
*** Will be the original Add A from the player's DSL contract
** Add B
*** Will be the original Add B from the playerâ€™s DSL contract
*** WIll include any and all terms entered onto the players DSL contract
** Add C:
*** For players on a First Year DSL Contract, this will be the standard Domestic C dictated by the CBA
*** For players on a Non-First Year DSL Contract, this will be the Add C from their DSL contract
** Add F:
*** Only included if the was included on the â€œDomestic mUPCâ€� modal
*** Will not print if toggle was off
** Add G:
*** Only included if the was included on the â€œDomestic mUPCâ€� modal
*** Will not print if toggle was off
** Add H
*** If the playerâ€™s original DSL contract included an Add H, it will be included
*** If there was not an Add H included, it will not print
** Life Insurance Form
*** If the playerâ€™s original DSL contract included a Life Insurance Form, it will be included
*** If there was not a Life Insurance Form included, it will not print
** Execution Page
*** A new execution page will print
* The sections will print in the above order

Note: An example blank doc is attached

[^New Boilerplate Plus C, F & G For DSL Transfers.pdf]

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to create a Domestic MNC for a DSL player
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When viewing the DSL Minor Contract for a player, there will be a â€œCreate Domestic Contractâ€� button
* When creating a MN Transfer tx where the From club is a DSL club and the To Club is a domestic club, there will be a â€œCreate Domestic Contractâ€� button available
* Clicking this button will launch a â€œDomestic mUPCâ€� modal
* This modal will have an Add A section
** â€œClubâ€� will be the only field in this section
* This modal will have sections for Add F and Add G
** Users will have the ability to Toggle these sections on and off, just like on a contract
** If Addendum F is toggled on, there will be a required â€œStateâ€� dropdown, consistent with actual contracts
* This modal will have a â€œCreate & Printâ€� and â€œCancelâ€� button
** Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action
** Create & Print will create a new â€œcontractâ€� that will, from a system perspective, function like a new Add C on the players DSL contract
*** It will appear in the playerâ€™s contract history as a â€œDSL Transfer Câ€�, showing F/G checks where appropriate
*** It will be displayed in the Add C widget with a type of â€œDSL Transfersâ€�



Note: Actual printing will be handled in a future story

Each report displays its own modal which then will open the specific report upon clicking run.

title: As a MJC Admin User, I want new Payment placeholders added to Award Bonus clause on MNCs
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Next to the â€œAmountâ€� field on the Award Bonuses clause on Minor League Contracts, there will be a new â€œPayment:â€� field label and two required fields
** Dropdown with the following values:
*** No later than
*** Before
*** On
** Date Picker
* There will be two new corresponding placeholders available when creating saved MNC Award Bonus Language in the Contract Language utility
** Amount
*** Will pull from the Amount field on the AB clause of MNCs
** Payment
*** Payment will be a concatenation of the two new dropdowns added to the AB Clause (i.e. Before 7/1/2024)
* When saved language that includes the new placeholders is included in a MNC, the printed version of the contract will display the value entered in the respective field instead of the placeholder.

Example language that will be entered:

{quote}*The maximum amount payable for Award Bonuses for each year of this Contract is $______*(_this field is pulled from the maximums table amount_)Â *and shall be payable _____________*Â (_this field is pulled from this new payment date field_).{quote}

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Koren Boilerplate Included in MNCs if the Player Speaks Korean

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to include a Bonus Maximum in Performance Bonuses of a MNC
custom_preconds:
Wire:  [https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|https://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=major_league_clause_updates&g=1|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a performance bonus is added to the Add B of a MNC, there will be an â€˜Include Maximum Amount Payableâ€™ option with a Yes / No radio buttons, as depicted in the wire
** It will be set to No by default
* When the Yes radio button is selected, three fields will be displayed, as depicted:
** Max Amount Per Year
*** Currency
** Paid
*** Dropdown with:
**** Before
**** No Later Than
**** On
** Date Picker
* The following sentence will also be displayed, with the BOLD portions completed by the above fields:
** The maximum amount payable for Performance Bonuses forÂ each yearÂ of this Contract is *[Max Amount Per Year]* and shall be payable *[Paid] [mm/dd/yyyy]*
* This sentence will also be printed at the bottom of the Performance Bonus section of the Add B
* If the radio button mentioned above is set to â€˜No,â€™ none of this will be printed

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see the total amount of bonuses a player can earn printed in MNCs
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Create a MNC and select to add Performance Bonus or Award Bonus
* On either PB or AB add multiple clauses
* After saving changes and selecting to print, you will be taken to a pdf
* Under the Addendum B page, at the top or bottom of the PB and AB tables will have a â€œTotal Offeredâ€� spot that shows the full amount the player can possibly earn in bonuses
* The amount will reflect the â€œTotal Offeredâ€� amount that is already calculated in the PB and AB tables on EBIS prior to printing

title: As a WLP Admin, I want a Date Filter added to the WLP Club Comm Screen in EBIS
custom_preconds:
Context: Currently, the WLP - Club Comm widget returns all reports ever created.  Users would like to export a smaller amount of reports.

AC:

* There will be a date range filter added to the header of the Reports widget on the WLP - Club Comm dashboard
* The beginning of the date range will default to Current Date - 6 Months
* The end of the date range will default to Current Date

title: Update Boilerplate on Major League UPCs
custom_preconds:
[^Appendix A (UPC).docx]

The boilerplate currently being used on MJCs is outdated, as it was never updated after the most recent CBA.  Attached is a redline document that highlights the changes needed.

title: Update Agent/Agency Import Log Template
custom_preconds:
* AC:
** When a user selects the â€œDownload Templateâ€� button, the template attached is the file that will download
** This file should replace the current Agent-Agency Template that is there

title: Update Agent/Agency Import Log Accepted Format
custom_preconds:
Business Value: Match the format that the MLBPA is sending us

AC:

* The user will upload a file with the following columns:
** UID
** PeopleID
** first_name*
** last_name*
** PeopleLeagalName*
** OrganizationName*
** PersonType*
** Address Type*
** StreetAddress1
** StreetAddress2
** StreetAddress3
** City
** State
** PostalCode
** Country
** Work Phone
** Cellular Phone
** Fax Number
** Email
** Certification Date*
** Last Designation Date
* The column labels with asterisks* will be required fields 
* When the UID column is not filled in, that will trigger the process of creating a new agent following a successful upload.

title: Update Logo Upload Sizes in EBIS
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When an affiliate profile is in edit mode, there will be text with instructions on uploading
* The note under the logo image be updated to read: â€œLogos must be uploaded at 750x750 as a .png on a transparent background. Please use the provided template for proper sizing and spacing.â€�
* There should be a validation in place to ensure the uploaded image is the correct size
* If the uploaded image is not 750x750, the system will return an error:
** Title: Error
Body:  The uploaded file is not the correct size.  Please upload an image that is 750x750
Buttons: Back
